"according to Paul Helmke , Barack Obama of the Sarah Brady campaign," the nra bosses went` all in' and lost big. they spent millions on their campaign to` defeat Barack Obama ' and failed. the gun lobby's single-issue voters failed to deliver. the nra spent heavily on tv and radio advertising in states that landed decisively in the democratic column, including virginia, pennsylvania, ohio, new mexico, florida, nevada, wisconsin, minnesota and others. it spent more than$ 1 million on senate races, with the largest amounts going towards losing races in north carolina and colorado. when it comes to common sense gun policies, our candidates won, the nra's candidates lost, and efforts to use the gun issue as a wedge issue flopped, " Paul Helmke said." we know of

updated october 7, 2008 14:53:00 unions say the banks should pass on the whole rate cut.( abc news: giulio saggin, file photo) unions say the big banks should pass on whole of today's expected cut in interest rates. the reserve bank has announced it is lowering the official interest rate by one percentage point, taking the cash rate to six per cent. the actu's Sharan Burrow said if the banks can not pass on the cut, they should explain why and agree to compensate consumers when conditions ease. if not today, what will be the cost of credit at the point when the interest rates will flow to working families, "she said." so no short-changing working families without evidence, and without a

"the department of sustainability and environment conducted an investigation after receiving reports of digging at the site." essentially it's on our land; it's crown land, dse northwest region spokesman peter beaton said. dse has been investigating. our investigations are based on a report someone had been digging. initially we didn't know who or why. we did find disturbances in the ground and the area had been fenced off by someone other than dse. victoria police has requested that the shaft remain accessible for a short time to allow them to complete an investigation. in the meantime dse is monitoring the site in case any safety related issues arise.
